mapper.sql: SELECT C.ID AS CONFIRMATION_ID, C.CREATED_AT AS CONFIRMATION_CREATED_AT, C.ATTEMPTS AS CONFIRMATION_ATTEMPTS, C.MODIFIED_AT AS CONFIRMATION_MODIFIED_AT, C.LINK AS CONFIRMATION_LINK, U.ID AS USER_ID, U.PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD, U.LAST_NAME AS USER_LAST_NAME, U.CREATED_AT AS USER_CREATED_AT, U.ENABLED AS USER_ENABLED, U.FIRST_NAME AS USER_FIRST_NAME, U.USERNAME AS USER_USERNAME, U.VERIFIED AS USER_VERIFIED, U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, U.AUTHORITIES AS USER_AUTHORITIES, U.STATUS AS USER_STATUS, U.DATE_OF_BIRTDAY AS USER_DATE_OF_BIRTDAY, U.SETTING AS USER_SETTING, U.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_MODIFIED_AT FROM argon.CONFIRMATIONS C LEFT JOIN argon.USERS U ON C.USER_ID = U.ID
